text.jpText:
うん、入着できた！
とりま安心ってとこ？
text.enText:
Yeah, I got in! I guess that's 
a relief for now.

text.jpText:
けど、ここじゃ満足できないし。
あーっ、1着とりたかったな……！
text.enText:
But I'm not satisfied here. Aww, 
I wish I'd gotten one…!

choices.jpText: でも走ってる君は楽しそうだった
choices.enText:
But you looked like you were 
having fun running.

choices.jpText: でも走ってる貴方は楽しそうだった
choices.enText:
But you looked like you were 
having fun running.
'Next time I'll take the first place,' right?
Next time, I'll take the first place," right?

text.jpText:
けど、ここじゃ満足できないし。
あーっ、1着とりたかったな……！
text.enText:
But I'm not satisfied here. Aww, 
I wish I'd gotten one…!

choices.jpText: でも走ってる君は楽しそうだった
choices.enText:
But you looked like you were 
having fun running.

choices.jpText: でも走ってる貴方は楽しそうだった
choices.enText:
But you looked like you were 
having fun running.
'Next time I'll take the first place,' right?
Next time, I'll take the first place," right?

text.jpText:
そりゃ楽しいでしょ。
だって走ってんだから！
text.enText: That's fun, isn't it? Because we're running!

text.jpText:
……待って、今のナシ。
アタシ最近、アホっぽくなってきてね？
text.enText:
… wait, now pear. I'm starting to feel 
like an idiot lately, aren't I?

choices.jpText: けどそれが貴方だから

text.jpText: ……この流れでそれ、全然嬉しくないわ。
text.enText:
… that in this vein, 
I'm not happy at all.

text.jpText:
やり直しさせて。次のレースは1着とって、
もっと“アタシ”らしーこと言うからさ！
text.enText:
Let me start over. I'll win the next race and 
say something more "me"!

text.jpText:
アンタに煽られんの、
なんかすごい不本意。
text.enText: I don't like being agitated by you.

text.jpText:
でも確かに、悔しがるだけじゃダサいわ。
いいよ、お望み通り言ってやる。
text.enText:
But sure, it's lame to just be contrite. 
Okay, I'll say what you want me to say.

text.jpText:
『次は1着をとる』。だからアンタも、
アタシに最高の走り、させてよね！
text.enText:
Next time, I'm going to win first place. So, 
please let me have the best run!
